name: Ultra Disc Club
description: Welcome to Ultra Disc Club! In this action-packed stadium, you’ll battle against AI or other players in a high-octane sport that combines frisbees with tennis! Take control of one of four characters, each representing a different part of George Mason University. Each character has their own unique playstyle affecting their speed, power, and their ultimate abilities. Will you lay down the law as The Judge? Use an invention to outsmart the opponents as The Engineer? Shut down the opponent’s hue-bris as The Painter? Or will you show your school spirit and take on the mantle of the GMU mascot, The Patriot? The choice is yours! Play now to find out if you have what it takes to be the Ultra Disc Club champion!
